name: Raleigh Professional Flight School
about: Raleigh Professional Flight School, owned by an experienced airline pilot, is dedicated to providing a structured path for aspiring pilots to achieve their airline careers. Located at Raleigh-Durham International Airport, the school offers a comprehensive Career Flight Program that can get students to the airlines in as little as 2 years. The Hero Pilot Program, a 9-month intensive course, prepares pilots with advanced skills using Garmin-equipped aircraft. The school provides multiple financing options and benefits from its professional airport setting, exposing students to a mix of airlines, cargo, private jets, and general aviation. With a focus on efficiency and proficiency, Raleigh Professional Flight School is committed to launching successful aviation careers.
